definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 fa1 she4 duan4 ceng2 zhao4 xiang1 shu4
containing_words.word: 正電子發射斷層照相術

sentences.english: X-ray photography used to fathom such mysteries as honeybee navigation.
sentences.chinese: 用來探測像蜜蜂飛行導向這類奧祕的x光照相術。

sentences.english: Myocardial perfusion scintigraphy provides complementary data for assessing ischemic burden.
sentences.chinese: 心肌灌注閃爍照相術對缺血程度估計提供輔助資料。

sentences.english: This peper presents a method for measuring rigid body motion by white light digital speckle photography.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一個測量物體剛體位移的數字白光散斑照相術。

sentences.english: It leads to the dramatic advances in astronomical photography.
sentences.chinese: 天文照相術得到巨大發展。

sentences.english: Schlieren photography is a very sensitive optical arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 條紋照相術是一種非常靈敏的光學技術。

sentences.english: Learn how to read a person just by looking at their hand using the ancient art of palmistry.
sentences.chinese: 只要通過古老的手相術就可以知道怎麼看一個人。

sentences.english: Janice: Are you sure? I've read a lot about palmistry.
sentences.chinese: 你真的不信？我讀過很多關於手相術的書。

sentences.english: Two Do you believe in palmistry?
The fundamental and developments of the laser speckle photography are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了激光散斑照相術的基本原理及其發展。
